info.author: Michael Kluge
info.description: identifies protein-DNA interaction at high resolution in ChIP-seq data
info.paperDescription: GEM (%SOFTWARE_VERSION%) was used to call peaks in the ChIP-seq data [Y. Guo, S. Mahony, D.K. Gifford, High Resolution Genome Wide Binding Event Finding and Motif Discovery Reveals Transcription Factor Spatial Binding Constraints. PLoS Computational Biology, (2012) 8(8): e1002638].

param.name: jarPath
param.description: path to GEM jar file

param.name: expt
param.description: aligned read file

param.name: readDistribution
param.description: read spatial distribution file

param.name: gpsOnly
param.description: run in GPS only mode

param.name: k
param.description: length of the k-mer for motif finding, use --k or (--kmin & --kmax); GEM parameter

param.name: kMin
param.description: min value of k, e.g. 6; GEM parameter

param.name: kMax
param.description: max value of k, e.g. 13; GEM parameter

param.name: seed
param.description: exact k-mer string to jump start k-mer set motif discovery; GEM parameter

param.name: genome
param.description: the path to the genome sequence directory, for motif finding; GEM parameter

param.name: outputPrefix
param.description: output folder name and file name prefix

param.name: control
param.description: aligned reads file for control

param.name: chrSize
param.description: genome chrom.sizes file with chr name/length pairs

param.name: format
param.description: read file format: BED/SAM/BOWTIE/ELAND/NOVO

param.name: sizeInBp
param.description: size of mappable genome in bp (default is estimated from genome chrom sizes)

param.name: alphaValue
param.description: minimum alpha value for sparse prior (default is esitmated from the whole dataset coverage)

param.name: qValue
param.description: significance level for q-value, specify as -log10(q-value) (default=2, q-value=0.01)

param.name: threads
param.description: maximum number of threads to run GEM in paralell

param.name: kSeqs
param.description: number of binding events to use for motif discovery; GEM parameter

param.name: memoryPerThread
param.description: total memory per thread in MB if running on local host; otherwise memory limit of executor might be set

param.name: useFixedAlpha
param.description: use a fixed user-specified alpha value for all the regions

param.name: JASPAROutput
param.description: output motif PFM in JASPAR format; GEM parameter

param.name: MEMEOutput
param.description: output motif PFM in MEME format; GEM parameter

param.name: HOMEROutput
param.description: output motif PFM in HOMER format; GEM parameter

param.name: BEDOutput
param.description: output binding events in BED format for UCSC Genome Browser

param.name: NarrowPeakOutput
param.description: output binding events in ENCODE NarrowPeak format

param.name: workingDir
param.description: path to working directory
